about.title: About me
about.description1: I am a web developer with a particular passion for clarity and user-friendliness. I love to come up with and implement new ideas within an internally coherent package. I am a tenacious problem-solver, and my workflow makes distinct use of intuition - both my own and the users'.
about.description2: I have always enjoyed technology and creative and analytical work on websites. Having turned my dream into a solid knowledge base and a career, I am continually eager to learn more and expand my skills.

references.title: References
references.subtitle: Here is what my colleagues say about me
references.text1: Joshua played a pivotal role in the app’s responsive design and overall user experience. He brought an excellent sense of UI/UX to the table, refined styles and component structure, and contributed significantly to making the application both visually appealing and functionally accessible. In template documentation, as well, he set new standards for precision and clarity.
references.text2: Joshua brings reliability and tremendous dedication to the team. Even in high-pressure situations, he maintains clarity and contributes practical solutions. I’ve especially valued his calm, solution-oriented approach—any challenge feels manageable with him on board. Working with Joshua was always a pleasure and truly collaborative.
references.text3: Joshua was a committed and approachable team member throughout our programming course. He consistently delivered high-quality work and showed strong dedication to meeting the team's goals and deadlines. His steady contributions helped maintain a positive team dynamic.
